thread.title: Duc

author: Duc
title: Duc
text: I read the the other reviewers and most of them were negative so I didn't ordered afraid same situation will happen to me but this sandal I want it for a long time and most of other store were sold out and Saks fifth avenue wants $395.00 but Essenes only charged $295.00 so I take a chance with Essenes and boy was I wrong about the negative reviews because I ordered the sandals around 11:00 today and it arrive with DHL next day very impressed and Essenes keep me posted about my order deliver so it proves that each is isn the way people feel KEEP UP THE WORK I will order from Essenes again and again thank you for haved the sandals shop it so fast to me
